p: The model of the regression equations of the encapsulation efficiency was very significant with P valueâ€‰<0.0001, the P value of lack of fit of the encapsulation efficiency was 0.2197, and the coefficient of R was fine. The predicted R 2 of 0.8622 reasonably agreed with the adjusted R 2 of 0.9443. The ratio of adequate precision was 13.856, and this model was adequate.
